name: Glycol Lactic Radiance Renewal Mask
about: What it is:A cult-favorite exfoliating mask packed with fruit acids clinically shown to boost skinu2019s radiance and firmness in 100 percent of individuals..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dark Spots, Dullness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Formulation:Mask.Highlighted Ingredients:- Glycolic Acid from Pineapple Extract: Gently exfoliates to remove dead skin cells..Ingredient Callouts:This product is cruelty-free, gluten-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:An exfoliating yet gentle multi-action AHA mask that helps to remove dead skin cells and reduce the appearance of fine lines and imperfections while boosting skinu2019s radiance and firmness, leaving skin feeling smoother and tighter..Clinical Results:In a clinical trial with 22 female subjects (ages 40u201355) after 30 minutes from one application, results included:.- 100% of consumers showed firmer- and more radiant-looking skin
ingredients: -Glycolic Acid from Pineapple Extract: Gently exfoliates to remove dead skin cells. .-Lactic Acid from Passion Fruit: Smooths and refines the look of skinu2018s texture. .-Papain from Papaya: Further removes dead skin cells to rejuvenate the overall appearance of skin texture and radiance. ..Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Polysorbate 60, Lecithin, Lactic Acid, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Seed Oil, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Xanthan Gum, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Maltodextrin, Sodium Lactate, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Glyceryl Caprylate, Passiflora Edulis Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Parfum* (Fragrance), Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Citrus Tangerina (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower Oil, Alcohol Denat., Benzyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Tocopherol, Hippophae Rhamnoides Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Sodium Bisulfite, Citral, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool...*100 Percent Natural Fragrance......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply a generous amount to clean skin. Avoid the eye area..-Leave on for 10 minutes and relax..-Rinse with lukewarm water or a damp washcloth..-A slight tingling sensation is normal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first Ren product and I have to say I was not impressed. I use other products with lactic acid and glycolic acid and usually get great results. With this mask I did not get the same results..my skin was blotchy after use, and my pores were enlarged and looked congested. It completely through my skins texture off, and made any makeup for 48hrs after use look bad. I would not recommend, and I caution anyone with sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is mask has two main ingredients lactic acid and glycolic acid which both are good to get even skin tone. I literally impressed by this mask as i have seen good result in just few days. It also helps to exfoliate my skin and unclog my pores properly and make my skin soft. Definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy using exfoliating masks. This particular mask may cause a slight tingling sensation, so if you have sensitive skin, proceed with caution. The outcomes are remarkable; my skin feels instantly brighter and softer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received byREN Clean Skincare. Radiance Glycol Lactic Radiance Renewal Mask 2024 ,  This product itch my skin and I feeled hot and sticky sense. I don't like it. It had a no good scent. I don't think that this product is for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The REN Clean Skincare Radiance Glycol Lactic Radiance Renewal Mask has worked wonders on my dull aging skin. The consistency is like honey and it's very gentle on the skin.  It leaves my skin feeling younger and tighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a sticky mask but I love the almost instant results that it imparts. I have dry skin and the mask neither irritates my skin nor makes it extra dry. I wake up with bright, refreshed glowy skin. The results remind me of Renu2019s Wake Wonderful night facial. I think itu2019s discontinued though. Glad to get my hands on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this renewal mask by Ren. Iu2019ve tried other things from this brand and this one did not disappoint either. Felt and looked like it took all the dirt and oil away, as I wear makeup and my skin gets oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good exfoliating mask. This REN Clean Skincare Glycol Lactic Radiance Renewal Mask really removed the dead skin cells and leaves my skin with a radiant glow. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very happy with the REN Clean Skincare Radiance Glycol Lactic Radiance Renewal Mask. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review and I have never used this brand before. Iu2019m glad I got a chance to try it because it has amazing ingredients, and it is gentle on my skin. I will be adding to my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am looking forward to continuing to use this Glycol Lactic AHA Mask by Ren once a week for a few more weeks to see the long term results in my age spots and acne marks. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The mask has a thick and sticky texture. It apply really well on the skin. Gently remove dead cells with the acid mask. My skin was noticeably more smooth and radiances.  Not irritated at all. Really like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was lucky enough to receive back when I got Ipsy bags YEARS ago and never looked back. Ive bought it regularly since then. I have sensitive skin (acne break out or light rash easily) and I could still use this 2x a week. Skin changer. I recommend this to everyone whether theyu2019ve been in the skincare game for a while or a just getting into it. It gives you a glow and sometimes I struggle with large blackheads on my forehead and I can use this mask and they shrink the same day if not disappear in a day or two. Definitely improves texture from hydration to unevenness to acne. You donu2019t use THAT much each time so this thing lasts me a while and has great shelf life. I see more results from one use of this sole product than using a very expensive skincare cocktail named after tipsy rhinos for over a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: okay, I've never used a Ren product before but I bought this for my baby sister, who has super oily combination skin and chronic acne (since childhood). she used it for the first time last night and we noticed some immediate results! her forehead was smooth, her skin was softer, and some of the redness from her recent flare up had already died down. it was a 4/5 right then and there. she didn't LOVE it, but she was definitely happy with the results and probably would have repurchased just for that.   here's the thing: she went to sleep. well, I woke her up a few minutes ago and her acne is all but GONE. It's like she's weeks out from a breakout instead of hours. my mom and I could not believe our eyes. she is SO happy and her skin is baby soft.  after ONE application. 10/5 will be purchasing again and we will absolutely be trying the rest of this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so weird, I don't even know how to describe it. It won't make you gag or anything, but it's not pleasant either. The texture is also very sticky which isn't the greatest. It does work though: it exfoliates dead skin, it makes your skin glowy. I like that's packaging too, it's in a pump so it's more hygienic. But I find one pump dispenses too much for my face (my face is on the small side) so I usually use half a pump. It also comes with a piece of cloth to help physically exfoliate too which is nice. You can't really use it without a cloth though because it's just much easier to remove it with one. I've been using it for a year and it does work, but I'm not repurchasing. I'm going to look for another chemical exfoliating mask that smells better, but works just as well. If I can't find one I'll definitely come back for this one.

reviews.review_title: Great mask with an interesting smell?

Ok so like when I say this thing smells, I mean itu2019s quite repulsive..for me at least! But I am 100% willing to put that aside cause this mask made my skin glow!!  You gotta put a generous amount and I kept it around 20 mins instead of 10. Your skin will thank you!

reviews.review_title: Facial in a bottle, worth every cent.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like a belt sander for the face! I have very dry, sensitive, aging skin and this product manages to bring me down to the primer coat in no time, but gently. I use this weekly, religiously, and like clockwork at least one person who see me remarks wow, your skin looks great! the day I use it. Usually my husband, but he counts, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an effective mask. In the morning, after Iu2019ve used it at night, my skin looks more supple and is baby soft. I do feel a slight tingle for the 10 minutes I have it on, but no irritation or redness afterwards. Given my dry, somewhat sensitive skin, I donu2019t use it as often as recommended, also because I use other treatments that exfoliate. Still, itu2019s an excellent mask that Iu2019m glad to have as part of my skincare regimen. Extra pluses that itu2019s from a cruelty-free line, which is a must for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best purchases Iu2019ve made from Sephora. I have sensitive dry skin, and I was very hesitant to add a chemical exfoliator to my routine, especially after the ordinary destroyed my skin. But not only is this mask gentle, it works well and it completely transformed my skin.   I went from dry flaky skin to hydrated and glowing. It also helped enhance all my other skin care products. I highly recommend it for anyone looking to add a chemical exfoliator thatu2019s gentle and it works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is another winner from Ren for me. I use it to exfoliate once a week and it leaves my skin is so soft and smooth for a few days after. I've tried many exfoliating masks that are just too harsh for my skin. I've tried others that didn't do anything. This one is just right - I definitely feel a difference in how my skin looks and feels after I use it, it does tingle slightly for the 10 minutes I have it on, but it ultimately doesn't cause any irritation. Yes, it feels like you are slathering on marmalade. Yes, it smells a bit weird (I actually don't mind it, it smells a bit orangey to me) but the smell doesn't linger when you wash it off. I also love the dispenser because it's way more hygienic than a jar, and of course, as always, love the clean ingredients. My skin just loves this brand! One by one, they have been converting me with all their products and this is no exception.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing mask- itu2019s like a one-step, gentler, more natural version of Philosophyu2019s Microdelivery Peel. My skin is more sensitive than it used to be, so for me itu2019s a perfect way to get the instant glow of an exfoliation and peel without that sunburn feeling afterwards. This mask got me eventually hooked on the whole REN AHA line. A skincare routine with multiple steps from one brand has never really been my thing, but REN products (and the AHA ones in particular) really do make a great system. It seems pricy at first, but it is potent, high quality stuff- a little dab will do ya- so the full-size bottles last for months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before buying this, I read through most of the reviews to see what to expect. Itu2019s sort of feels like youu2019re putting marmalade on your face and I leave it on for about an hour. It has a very pleasant citrus smell to it. After I washed it off...my face was incredibly soft and much brighter in skin tone. My favourite peel is the drunk elephant one, however that one makes me break out bad and this one does not! I think this truly is a lovely product and I canu2019t wait to see what my skin looks like in a month. I bought it to lighten up a few dark spots from sun damage! I highly recommend it and Iu2019m seeing results after a week use. Yes it is very expensive for what you get, but I think itu2019s so worth it!

The coverage is amazing and a little goes a long way (no, this is not a paid ad).  I have oily skin so weu2019ll see how it helps.  Overall, I recommend for a new mask for intermittent use.

reviews.review_text: I've got as a sample and never cared for it, ended up using maybe 2 years after I got it and absolutely loved it. Even after that time was still working great. So once I was at Sephora and a representative for REN was there and I asked what was the percentage of glycolic acid and she told me 9% (even though online I found different information). SkinCeuticals' mask is 4%.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product for smoothing and tightening rough skin. Doesnu2019t sting or dry out. Good on sensitive skin. I use it once a week and exfoliate other days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve never tried a product once and then committed to buying the full size, until now. Iu2019ve used this mask 3 times and after every treatment, I seriously consider never using anything else again.  Itu2019s made with a potent mix of 4 alpha hydroxy acids (AHAs); glycolic, lactic, citric, and tartaric. This mix gently exfoliates, resurfaces, and firms the skin, leaving you with a radiant glow. Itu2019s got a natural honey-like texture (minus the stickiness) and a light fruity scent. And like all REN products, itu2019s made with clean, sustainably sourced ingredients (woo!).
