reviews.review_title: Absolute game changer for problematic skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute game changer. This is the best skincare product Iu2019ve ever purchased. I have sensitive, acne prone skin - almost everything breaks me out. I was looking for a product that would help with skin texture and old acne scars. The girl at Sephora suggested this one and I took a chance on it...Iu2019m so glad that I did! While Iu2019ve only used it a few times and I canu2019t speak to whether or not it will end up helping my skin texture or scarring, I can say that my skin was visibly brighter after one use, it felt less congested, it felt smoother as well and not only did I NOT break out...the next day, the few pimples I did have were gone! The same thing has happened both other times Iu2019ve used this mask as well. Iu2019m so happy with this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I researched long and hard for the type of mask I wanted, its ingredients, and the results I was looking for and this was it. And you KNOW itu2019s good when every Sephora employee who sees it in your hands remarks, u201cOoooh, girl, that is AMAZING; youu2019re gonna love it!u201d And it truly lived up to my expectations. You can really feel it workingu2014I actually got a little worried it was going to leave my face red because it did burn a tiny bit, but I donu2019t have particularly sensitive skin so I stuck with it. Once my face was wiped, dried, and moisturized, it was so smooth and just glowing! My foundation went on smoothly and even my boyfriend noticed how good my skin looked and how smooth it felt. I had broken out a bit from his mustache wax (all of his beard and stache products make me break out), and they subsided considerably by the next day. In love with this and canu2019t wait until next week so I can use it again! Iu2019m a pretty loyal Murad girl, but Iu2019m really excited to try other products in the Ren line because this is just THAT good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this mask and have used it twice so far. Iu2019m amazed by how quickly I saw results. As soon as I rinsed it off I noticed how radiant my skin looked. Ive been a huge fan of Ren but this is by far the best product I have tried from the brand. I will definitely be purchasing the full size and would absolutely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used up the whole bottle of this mask and it dis nothing to my skin. It looks the same as it was before! What a waste of money. It smells nice that it is all, the texture  is also fine, however this mask did not fulfill it its main purpose. Will not buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so glad I finally purchased this! It's changed the way my skin looks. I use it once a week

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Works fairly well. Very smooth skin after fully drying.. One pump is far too much, you only really need a half a pump or so.... wonu2019t buy again.. donu2019t like the consistency/texture... its quite sticky.. smells good though i think, very fruity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lifesaver for my adult acne! I use it twice a week before bed, and wake up with considerably clearer skin! It makes my skin look very radiant, and I love the fruity smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't love this and won't repurchase. I did feel the tingling, but I have noticed any changes. I have fairly good skin, dark spots are my main concern and this didn't do anything for them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So prepared to get heken soft and smooth the first time you try it. After having it for a month and doing it once a week, I've noticed my skin texture overall has improved and gotten a lot more supple with minimized pores and my acne scarring has really reduced quite a bit. A pimple I got during the first week I used it scarred over almost immediately and even the pigmentation is reducing! I'm pretty happy with this wow! Ty Ren!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: People with sensitive skin don't be afraid to try this!!! It's gentle enough to exfoliate and shrink pores without a reaction for the most sensitive types!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used my points for a deluxe sample. I tried this mask twice. It didn't do anything at all. The second time I left it on my skin for a full hour, absolutely no difference in my skin at all. Was it expired? No expiration date on package. It's was like rubbing expired orange marmalade mixed with honey on my face. Ridiculous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve purchased this twice in like a year and a half, and I love it. Itu2019s one of the best masks for acne scars, I use this in conjunction with the Sunday Riley good genes and my scars have faded to nearly nothing. This tingles a bit but itu2019s not bad, and you really get a ton of uses out of this package. Worth every cent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Second time buying this because it works! It just exfoliates and renews the skin gently. I use it about once or twice a week on my 58 year old combination skin and it keeps things smooth and glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is very gentle. I didn't notice a significant difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: During exam season I drank a venti coffee every day, got no sleep, and stressed a lot. My skin had never looked worse. After a couple of months, as my breakouts started to minimize once again I had extreme discolouration on my skin, scars, and acne marks. I bought this product, I use it 1-3 times a week for the past 4 months. Most of my acne marks are completely gone, and the overall discolouration of my skin improved greatly. This may not heal your acne/lines/scars BUT IT HELPS A LOT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing for dry flaky skin!

I feel compelled to write a review on this product because itu2019s just so amazing. Iu2019ve struggled with acne, oily skin and uneven skin tone for most of my life. Iu2019ve tried everything you can imagine to help my skin. This product is a miracle. When I first started using the mask, it made my skin very dry afterwards but I think my skin was adjusting to it. I left it on for 10 minutes and it made my skin dry and flakey the following week. The second time, I only applied it for 5 minutes, this was the magic number for me because my skin wasnu2019t as dry. I recommend you try using it for less time than the 10 minutes if you find it makes your skin dry. Each time Iu2019ve used it, my skin has gotten smoother and more glowing, and less dry. It is helping my acne scarring and the texture of my skin is so smooth now. My makeup looks flawless now. I also believe this mask prevents acne - Iu2019ve barely had a single pimple since using this mask. It makes sense that it would prevent acne because it removes the top layer of skin and the dead skin cells that clog your pores. I highly recommend this mask! You wonu2019t regret your purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bough the Ordinary's glycolactic acid hoping it would be a dupe. Nope, not even close. Going back to Ren. Nothing I've tried through the years comes even close to this stuff, worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My bi-weekly mask that changed my life. It does wonders for your skin. Every promise that it makes, it fufils.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing produt.  Not only does it make my skin glow but it actually minimazes my rosacea symptoms.  Absoultely worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this mask. I was really sceptical at first, just due to the texture, but I'm coming to love it. Upon initial use, my pores on my nose looks smaller, and in the morning my skin was more luminous and somewhat firmer looking; this was especially noticeable on my forehead. The smell is also quite nice (it's sweet and citrusy), and I don't find it to be drying.   I must say though, don't rely on this mask alone for exfoliation, you'll need to slough off dry spots with an exfoliant later in the week. Reading other people's reviews, I was shocked to see that they were experiencing tingling. I exfoliated with belief mild and effective scrub first then applies this makes, and I think my skin is more receptive to it this way. Even though I do tend to have sensitive skin I wouldn't recommend this method for everyone. I've also experimented with leaving this mask on for upwards to two hours, and my results were pretty good.    I suppose I was expecting immediate results, which I didn't experience, but I like how gentle this peel is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this stuff's magic. I have dry, sensitive skin and in the winter I frequently get dry flaky patches. you put this stuff on for ten minutes and its gone. GONE. highly recommend, nothing else works as well as this. nothing bad to say about this mask, its never irritated my skin once.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: But was brilliantly shocked at the results from first try. Buying full size immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I must admit, I'm in my 30's so i'm a bit obsessed with any product promising to deeply exfoliate my skin. This mask is amazing! It's recommended to use once weekly because it contains 9% Glycolic acid but I use it twice weekly as I'm a fan of chemical peels and i'm not a novice user. It does tingle/itch a bit but its tolerable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is incredible! I suffer from hormonal acne and have a few acne scars from it and this has helped clear them up significantly. I still break out from time-to-time but when I use this mask during a break out I've noticed my acne clears faster and any dark spots or scars are cleared faster too. I've also found that when I don't use the product my skin feels dull and I notice fine lines more so then I'll use this mask and the next day my skin looks 10X better - it feels smooth, hydrated, and looks brighter! I don't have significant wrinkles but I have a crease in-between my brows that I've noticed has been reduced so much since using this product. I also love that you only need to have it on for 10 minutes so it's a quick process you can do before bed. I purchased this mask over a year ago and I use it weekly (sometimes will miss a week or two) and I still have plenty of product in the bottle. It may be pricey for a mask but it lasts a really long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's an ok mask. Does it make anyone else itch? it doesn't itch while it's on, but 30 or so minutes after I remove it, my face starts itching.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Miracle 10 min mask once a week and your skin gets what it needs! Pamper your skin with one mask, that does it all! Smooth, glow, and exfoliate wrapped in one!

reviews.review_title: Great quick fix for dull skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin was looking dull so I searched products on my Sephora app and came across this mask. I used it as instructed and immediately post mask my skin was glowing and looked smoother with less visible pores. There is a slight tingling with this mask but it wasn't uncomfortable. I don't like recommending products to anyone unless I absolutely love them because I don't want people wasting their hard earned money. With that being said, I've recommended this mask to my sister and close friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had never previously heard of this brand, or product, was was suggested it by a wonderful woman I met at a market research study. I grabbed a sample, used it once, and DAYS LATER my skin still looks incomparable to before I used it. I suffer from scarring and discoloration from acne, which causes me serious distress and frustration. No joke, I have only used this once so far, and my marks are faded enough that my confidence in public is up.   I've only given 4 stars for now since I haven't used it extensively, but I imagine after buying a full size, it'll be 5 stars from me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this mask for a couple years now - I adore it! It smooths acne bumps, unclogs pores, and sloughs off dry patches and scaliness. Super smooth face is revealed, and the scent is divine. One note: if you have any open acne spots, this will sting for a sec if you apply over them. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Must try if you have texture!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This mask has changed my life. I've always had issues with texture and uneven skin tone after going through a tough breakout phase. Not kidding you I used this twice & my skin feels so smooth & brighter. Glycolic is always important to incorporate in your skincare regimen as it help with texture and brightening the skin. Ren is good for sensitive skin too. I'm super sensitive and I had no breakouts after! Try to use a good moisturizer to prevent your skin from drying though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to test out a new face mask, the girl working at Sephora recommended it as one of her favorites, so I tried a sample.  I loved it and went back to buy it the next week!  I tried a few other masks that week and this was my favorite by far.  I like the gel texture much better than thick creams or overly dry clay types.  Easy to use, feels nice while it is on, and my skin felt fresh and soft immediately after.  Just started using it a couple of weeks ago so I can't speak for the long term effects, but so far all good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! Right after the first use you can tell a difference in the quality, tone and look of your skin. It didn't burn or bother my skin at all and I am usually sensitive. I will continue to buy this and recommend to everyone!!

This product helped with my texture after just one use! I get small bumps along my hair line and it was reduced significantly! I think if I keep using this for the best few weeks, this product will absolutely change my skin! Also I have super sensitive redness prone skin and this only just tingled a little bit around my nose. My skin looks amazing!

Well, it smells inoffensive and I always find that to be a plus. This mask itches on my skin like craaaaazy. I could only stand it for about 6 minutes. I had this as a deluxe sample and finally got around to trying it. I was worried the major reaction could potentially be an allergy since my skin is generally pretty hardy with chemical exfoliants. I figured it would be worth mentioning for those with sensitive skin. Overall I adore Ren products though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I started using ten products about a week ago. This product specifically is my favorite. It is strong smell wise but my skin is VERY sensitive and it did not break me out. It left my skin glowing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the mask I use for every season except for summer (when I use the Ren Clarimatte). It makes my dull and tired skin radiant and smooth. It may be too aggressive for very sensitive types, but I'm sensitive and it's been fine. I don't think it does anything for hyperpigmentation, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with refining texture and exfoliation of any kind, so naturally, I was drawn to something that has two types of AHAs. I prefer this over any standalone glycolic treatment because glycolic acid can draw moisture from your skin causing it to be dry. With the lactic acid combined with it, it helps draw in and keep moisture so you get the best of everything! Lactic acid is a humectant, so it draws moisture from the air to keep moisture in your skin. I honestly don't think I could find a better mask that I could get today in Sephora. The ingredients combined with the weight of the product (not too thin so it doesn't move too much or thick so it doesn't glide enough) and the cloth it comes with to remove it, that actually works surprisingly well, makes for an entirely pleasant experience. I can't speak to any other claims since I don't fight with really anything other than minor texture, so I can't comment on anything other than the glorifying texture reduction!

I've been using this for four months and it's improved my skin. I had blemishes due to acne scarring and this significantly helped to lighten them. When a pimple is surfacing or has popped I use this as a spot treatment to avoid developing a scar. I usually leave it on for about 30 minutes and rinse if off with water. I like to apply this before I go to bed. I have very sensitive skin and this has never irritated my skin. I highly recommend it and will be repurchasing.
This smells so bad there's no way I could ever use this even if it was good. It smells like spoiled play-dough.
I absolutely LOVE this mask. I've been using it for the past 3 weeks and instantly my face looks/feels soft, fresh and hydrated. This is definitely a must have!
one of my all time favs. it has really helped reduce my active acne and acne scars while brightening and smoothing my skin. Smells amazing and feels great.
Is easy to wash off and brightens and tightens. Not my favorite but I'd buy it on sale

This mask will make your face feel so soft and glow to the gods! I love putting this mask on when your skin is not looking so hot and you don't wanna do a harsh exfoliation. It brings your skin back to life!! I highly recommend it!
Great product for radiance and pore purification. I have purchased this item about 6 times over the past 3 years.

I have very dry, textured skin.. in fact I actually have keratosis pilaris. I have used this a few times.... and oh man my skin is transforming into such a smooth surface. This is the best I have seen my skin since I was a young kid. Now I have been using this a little more often than recommended. I first used it twice the first week and then followed once a week afterward. I wouldn't recommend doing it twice a week, I just saw the results the first use and got super excited. The second time around did give me nice results but my face turned a bit red and took about a day and a half to fully calm down. I have been using other products is conjunction with this, but so far this has been giving the quickest results.

I just opened up this mask and tried it on, and it instantly smelled like it expired over a year ago. I could NOT find the expiration date, it wasn't printed on the packaging or the container. I couldn't wash it off of my face fast enough! Felt very greasy and heavy, not how a mask should feel at all.

I have combination skin that's been doing well with my regimen of water   pm lotion & water   am sunscreen. As I approach 27 though, & since moving back to the desert, my skin needs a little oomph. I found this to be a good exfoliator, gentle enough for a newbie, & non-irritating (for me). It does smell a little bit like orange Flintstone's vitamins, but it's made to be rinsed off so eh. Those who are used to serious chemical peels might be underwhelmed. While it makes my skin smooth & glowy, I do use a charcoal mask after to get at blackheads it hasn't done much for. Overall glad I purchased, but might go for a slightly more multitasking product like the Algenist micropolish next time so I don't have to use multiple masks.
I absolutely love this product does what it says and doesn't irritate my skin. Love love love :)
Easy to use, super-effective. Holy grail for me!
Absolutely amazing! That's all I need to say! Way to go REN!
Can't say enough good things about this mask! Love using this before an event, really does make your skin radiant!! Please make this in a travel size!!

I tried this because I wanted to get more of a glow and lighten dark spots. I have dark combo skin with some hyper pigmentation FYI. I never saw any effect or change. It didn't burn or smell bad so I'll give it that.
This is like magic in 10 minutes! My deep wrinkles disappear! Love it! I use it before special occasions ;)

I had received a deluxe sample of this awhile back and had not used it yet. Finally used it last night and was amazed at the results. It's the first exfoliating mask that had an instant impact. When I washed it off my face, I could feel how smooth my face was and there was a glow. However, I have to warn you that it is a little harsh on my sensitive skin. I did feel some tingling during the 10 minutes and there was a slight redness on my cheeks. But the product smoothed out my skin and definitely cleared up all the acne I had beneath the skin.Went ahead and ordered the full size right away. This will be part of my weekly routine.

This was a gift in a subscription and when I first put it on I thought - ok this stuff is weird! But I let it sit and when I washed it off I was literally glowing. My boyfriend works nights and when he came home The morning after I used it he commented WOW your skin looks amazing! This will be a staple in my routine!

I have been using this product twice a week for about 5 months now and i have seen a lot of improvement in my skin! I have some acne scars and had a lot of texture in my skin because my skin got very irritated when using physical exfoliators. But this chemical exfoliator has brightened by skin and lightened my scars, getting me at my goal complexion.
I was really hoping this would work for Me like did others. It didn't absolutely nothing for My skin just made my bank account less :(
This has been one of my favorites for years! The smell is fantastic! It's like rubbing marmalade on your face. Whenever my skin is super dry and flaky, this saves me every time!

I was recommended this mask as a first time chemical peel/radiance mask by one of the ladies at Sephora and I am in love!! I have large pores, texture, and acne, and this mask seriously improved all of the above in one use, in addition to giving me glowing skin the next day. I have no complaints about the smell (I actually like it). It does tingle/itch on my face, but I don't mind because it makes me feel like its working! I want to use it on everyone I know but I also don't want to share my bottle!!! lol

I was expecting huge results from this mask but as other reviewers said it may take a couple applications to see the miraculous results I had read about on several sites. I already use Drunk Elephant glycolic night serum nightly and DE Vitamin C serum daily...LOVE both products. Being in my 40's I baby my skin and since reading about the ant-aging benefits of a daily lactic glycolic regimen I use one of these powerhouses daily. Cane and Cane daily peel in 20% is a game changer. I used it daily and sometimes twice daily for 4-5 months. I have no more hyper pigmentation, no visible pores, no fine lines and my skin literally glows. Maybe because I am not a newbie to a strong lactic or glycolic product I didn't get the results from Ren Radiance Renewal Mask as I hoped for. I am going to add it to my weekly regimen though.

This is the second time I have purchased this! I use this 2-3 times a week and definitely keeps my skin looking nice and polished. The reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the tingling sensation with this product can sometimes feel more itchy than tingling. No pain, no gain though!
Smells good, but I didn't know much of a change in my skin other than it feeling really soft afterwards.
I got this because my coworker swears by this. However, it did nothing for me. I did not notice any difference in my skin texture, hyper pigmentation, etc.

I was a little skeptical buying this, I read the ingredients and it seemed like they wouldn't work.  I am so happy I bought this!  First time trying it I noticed how bright my skin looked, it felt unclogged and smooth!  My skin also looked plumper

reviews.review_title: Wanted to love this product, no noticeable results
reviews.review_text: I think this is the kind of product that you need to use 'long-term' (I'm talking about half a year to a year?) in order to see effects because (1) I didn't notice any immediate changes, (2) I used this product until it was empty, and (3) I've used REN products before and thought this would be just as effective. I don't think the price point justifies the product. I have combination skin with quite a bit of discolouration, blemishes, etc. Sad it didn't do anything.
my skin glows after. i love masks.  this is one of my go tos. also love chloroplasma by perricone.

I had awful scarring from cystic acne. My skin was dull, scarred, had uneven texture... it was awful. I got this mask and oh. my. god. I'm so impressed! I use it 1-2x a week for about a month and it has completely faded my acne scars and my skin is as flawless as a baby. It's insane. So happy I got this. I finally feel like I can go out of the house without face makeup bc my skin already looks so good. I cannot recommend enough!!!! Just try it, it could change your life.

This is one of the few masks on the market that after you use it you notice instant results. Follow the instructions and then rinse off and you will notice there is an instant boost of radiance on your skin.

I have this on my face right as I am typing up this review. Do not get me wrong, this mask works. I've seen result from using it, but if you are sensitive to scents, you may want to try a sample first before getting the full size. I wouldn't have ever said that I am particularly sensitive to product scents, but I force myself to tolerate this one since I've paid for it and all. It smells like rancid play doh. (It's the only thing I can think of to compare to and I am not even that familiar with the smell of play doh!) Plasticky and herbal at the same time. I believe it is just the scent of the product and not from any type of fragrance added in. Like I mentioned though, it works, but be warned.

Hands down one of my favorite Glycol Lactic masks! As a licensed Esthetician, I always get asked what's the best product to use for clear, bright skin? THIS is it! Thank you Ren for bringing back my glow.

What a great product. Pleasant and easy to use, clarifies skin as well or better than a professional treatment, and I don't have to get dressed and go to a salon to get a hard sell from an esthetician. Price not heap but once a week usage and not much product needed means a pretty cost effective product.

I didn't know what to expect with this mask but the results blew me away after one use. I was looking for something with both glycolic and lactic acids, having some good luck with them in other products. My skin was way brighter, softer, and my red spots totally stettled down! I'll definitely be buying the full size!

This mask is perfect if you're looking to correct blemishes fast. I received it in a trial size and instantly fell in love. Honestly a must have if you start breaking out early on in the week and need to look your best by Friday night!
Pre-Friday night ritual product! Instant results, yields glowing, dewy skin! Great as a once a week pick-me-up!

At first when I started to use this gave me no results... but a week ago I decided to give it another chance since I paid for it and it's pricy but this time I didn't do the recommended once a week 10min. I left it just a little longer and did it every night and so far I've seen my face a lot better, works very good for the forehead acne. I seen some results. Hopefully it keeps working. Use it everyday! And you will see some results.

I've had this mask for a few months and I recently started having small breakouts on my chin and forehead. All my other products weren't helping (I even use RetinA). So I gave this a shot as a spot treatment. I put this all over the area I was having breakouts and slept with it on and it seriously helped soooo much! I was afraid it was going to dry my skin out after keeping it on for so long, but it didn't at all. I even started putting this all over my nose at night for blackheads and they're starting to disappear. I started using this every night for the last week and I'm really noticing a difference in my skin.
Never noticed a difference while using this mask. It smells nice but doesn't do much
So confused how this works for other people. This literally did absolutely nothing for my skin and felt/looked the exact same and I've been using it 1-2 a week for a month
This really does make those small bumps on your forehead disappear! Other parts of my face I don't really see a difference but I'm satisfied with what it does for my forehead
This is a super quick fix for when my skin feels clogged. It looks instantly refreshed and the effects last for a few days.

Obsessed with this! Leaves my skin looking radiant, not drying at all, non-irritating, it does tingle but who doesn't like to feel like a product is doing its job? Also love the smell (it sort of smells like mexican spicy candy) and looks like it will last for a while. Got this as a sample years ago and decided to give it a try again and I'm so glad I did! Can't stop staring at my skin :) not sure how often one should use it though but can't wait to use again

First of all, I rarely write a review on any beauty products. Because most of the time it has no JAW dropping effects! This mask is the BOMB and all the above. I recieved a sample and after the first use-I noticed an all around difference! My Skin glowed, pigmentation decreased, firming of skin, smaller pores and NO BREAKOUTS the next day!!!! Needless to say- I'll be buying more!

I use this once a week and it has completely cleared up the little bumps I used to have on my forehead. I leave it on for 30 minutes instead of the recommended 10. Also, make sure to use the cloth provided and not just your hands to rinse it off. Love this product!

First off, i have never written a review for any product, but i felt compelled to write one for this mask! i got this mask as a sample size and i am hooked! i have normal skin with a lot of dry and flaky patches around my acne. i mostly have acne on my forehead, and sometimes on my jawline and hairline. i've had acne for almost 5 years now, nothing really seems to work too well, however when i tried this mask my skin immediately became less irritated, more glowing. and the next morning, i woke up with no new breakouts (VERY RARE) and the other ones healing! i used it again a couple of days later and it helped even more. now i use it twice a week and my skin is almost acne free! strongly suggest this for teenagers and other people with problem skin !!!
I can't live without this multi tasking mask .
I used this once a week for 3 weeks and saw no improvement.

This isn't getting a perfect score because it didn't give me the flawless, glowing skin some other reviews described. However, it's really close to being a five star product. It absolutely evens tone, corrects redness and gives skin a very healthy glow that lasts for at least a day.   Still, if you're serious about peeling, I feel that the top of the line peel pads do a better job. Dr. Dennis Gross is still my favorite, but the price on this is a little easier to stomach.   Also, it's okay to leave it on a little longer than the 15 minutes the bottle recommends, but I wouldn't use it more than twice a week u2014 I tried every other day and it caused redness and irritation.
Absolutely amazing. I got a sample of this in my ipsy bag and I'm HOOKED. I'm also a huge face of the flash facial. I'll be using more ren products !
I received a sample of this and have been in love ever since. I have sensitive skin, and this worked wonders for me. Left my skin feeling super soft.
I got a sample in my Ipsy bag and used it last night. It made my skin so soft and tight but a little red. Just moisturize good afterwards. I like this product.

I got the sample size a while ago and first I must say I have VERY oily skin and acne. The product is quite sticky so I thought it would have a greasy residue but it's really nice totally brightens your face and decreases redness and irritation on acne. I typically hate masks because it's such a hassle but this is a must and I get complements on my skin clearing all the time now.

The ren representative says this is a chemical peel. It's really nice and gentle. It's almost like a goo texture but it smells like fruit juice which I like. When I wash it off, my skin feels so good for days!!! It makes it feeling smoother and firmer and brighter. It's the perfect canvass to apply makeup on after. I'm just waiting for the other results if it improves my acne and my scaring like it says but otherwise I don't regret spending money in this product because it is literally doing something to your skin!!!

Bought this product without getting any sample first, I just relied on the reviews. Upon receiving the package, I tried it right away. Didn't feel any tingling sensation despite of leaving it on for more than 30minutes. Upon wiping it off with the cloth, didn't see any difference at all. I was so disappointed as I have high hopes on this product. BUT, after rinsing with warm water... I was surprisingly amazed!!! My skin instantly becomes so soft and its glowing! As if I am wearing a bb cream. I can't wait to try other REN products!

I have tried so many different masks. From sheet masks to clay masks to sleep masks I have probably tried it. This is the first time I've used a mask and immediately noticed a difference in my skin. I have oily skin with sun spots, old acne scars, and some hyper pigmentation. After using this mask one time the dark spots on my nose from old sunburns were visibly diminished. I couldn't stop staring at my face. I'm hooked (P.S right now this mask is in a set for $18 on sale along with another great facial. Buy 3 of those instead of the full size of this one while you can, you save a ton!)
Instantly soothes dry skin and plumps it! Love this product.
Wanted to like the product but it clogged my pores and broke me out a bit. However, the 1 minute flash rinse and gentle milk cleanser is amazing!!!

I received a sample size of this and I'm hooked. This is one of the only masks i've used that have had a noticeable effect on my skin. Whenever my skin starts to feel rough and in need of a good exfoliation, I turn to this. Immediately after, my skin feels smooth and hydrated. Definitely will purchase full size.

I really like this product! I bought the Blue Tansy mask hoping to find a naturals brand that could help with resurfacing (I'm oily with discoloration left from pregnancy), but the smell was overpowering!!! I was about to give up when I found a sample of this in my drawer. I was so impressed that I exchanged the other for this immediately. It does have a distinct scent, but not overpowering and not unpleasant. This mask is especially effective when used with the cloth it is packaged with for additional exfoliation; the mask loosens everything up and the cloth wipes it away! Highly recommend.

I received a deluxe sample of this with my order. I loved what it did to my face, giving it a baby glow, but it smelled so bad! Smelled like old fat...I couldn't finish the entire tube. I loved the product, I would even be ok with a heavy, sticky texture, but that smell...I don't know, on the other hand, it had a fantastic result. I might repurchase after all...

This is the very first time I ever make a review on anything as I don't want to be a marketing tool for any products whether it's good or bad. I've been spending a crazy amount of money on skincare and make-ups hoping to find the best of of best for myself. This mask is so far the best I've ever used! I got a mini sample from Sephora on the last haul I got and decided to give it a try. Left it on for 10 mins then washed it off, oh wow my skin has never looked this way before. I mean it's so soft and bright like I was 10 year younger. Also I suffered a bit from a crazy Halloween make up last week which had broken my skin very badly but this mask is truly a life saver (I also use the Origins Charcoal mask first before applying this mask though). Bottom line, If I could only use one mask for the rest of my life, this would be it. It works for me and sorry if it doesn't for somebody else. The only negative thing is the price. :(

Definitely not a must-have for me but I'm glad I tried it! It has a nice orange smell and goes on smooth and easy! I've used it 4 times in 1.5 weeks and it's makes my skin feel super soft! I don't see any lasting effects happening with my tone or pores but like I said.. nice splurge!

I love the texture and scent (slightly citrus), it easier spread on my skin. I let it sit for 10 mins and then wash it off with the little mini towel it comes with. My skin feels tighter immediately after, and it makes my skin glow like no other mask I've seen before. It made my pores so much smaller too!

I tried a sample of this mask and instantly fell in love! I liked the consistency of it, and the fact that it dried but not so much where it was hard to rinse off.. My skin was radiant, looked less dull and was very smooth. I have some dark spots that I am working to get rid of and this will definitely be a staple of mine.
Reduces pore size and diminishes texture with one application!

It's amazing what this mask can do. I have a lot of acne scars and uneven skin tone. I don't use it as prescribed. I use it more than 2 times a week. I put a thin, medium layer before I go to bed and wash it in the morning. It cleaned my face really well. I still have some scars but it's a lot better. Plus..if I have big pimple under the skin, after one application it's almost gone. I will definitely repurchase.
You can see a difference with this product yet I have no issues with having sensitive skin

This is made with all natural ingredients.  That's number one. Number two, although its thick and kind of sticky it makes your face glow. When I say glow, I mean glow like no need for face make up glow. Love love love this product.

The texture is weird; its hard to spread, kind of like old honey. Also like honey its hard to completely wash off your face + it makes my makeup ball. Maybe this is just me, but i have dry sensible skin and it made my face itchy, red, and even more sensible to other products after using 3-5 times. i would not recommend if you have my skin type!! Also, it has quite a strong orange/citrus fragrance and make sure to moisturize after. With my Philosophy renewed hope in a jar moisture mask i dont have to do this. Maybe it will work for other skin types but the texture isnt the best.

Weird texture, dripping all over my shirt. Definitely the grossest thing I have ever used on my face. Not a pleasant experience. It didn't do any good for my skin either. Wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

reviews.review_title: The Radiance Part is No Joke
reviews.review_text: This mask really does make your skin GLOW with a smooth radiance. It's actually kind of mindblowing how my texture is always GONE when I wash it off. I also love this product not only for the results but for the feel of it on my face-- after 10 minutes, I like to add a little bit of warm water, really rub/pat it into my skin one last time, and then wash it off.

reviews.review_title: A M A Z I N G!!!
reviews.review_text: Love Love LOVE this product!! Been batteling congested pores for a while now tried a ton of products but nothing seems to help. Used this product only ONCE and immediately saw a huge difference in my pores. Not only was the congestion gone but also my pores were visibly smaller already!! Also this product stays moist the entire time so I did not experience the dryness I normally do after most masks. Alittle higher priced for a face mask but def worth the money results are instant!

I definitely didn't like what it did to my face as i seemed to break out all over after rinsing the product off. I tested it on my arm as well - no breakouts there and my skin was a lot smoother afterwards.  Likely wouldn't try it again.

I received a sample of this product and after using it once I am amazed. I put it on at night for 10 minutes and washed it off. My skin looked fresh, not much of a difference that I noticed at the time. However, the next day when I looked in the mirror mid day, I noticed that my expression lines around my mouth, between my eyebrows and on my forehead were about 75% reduced!! My makeup, and it's quality makeup, would ALWAYS settle in those lines more and more throughout the day. Nothing I had previously tried worked on reducing this problem. This mask has saved me a trip to the skin clinic, because that was my next step to get rid of the lines. I am so happy I tried the product and will be purchasing the full size. I have fair and somewhat sensitive skin and beside a very small amount of tingling I did not have any issues.

reviews.review_title: If I Could Take Only One Product With Me...
reviews.review_text: ...on, say, an island. Or, Survivor. Okay, I'll even make this bold statement: if I could have only one product for the rest of my life (maybe some kind of post-apocalyptic, worst-case-scenario kind of thing), THIS -- this! -- would be that product.   Skip the spa, ladies. No need for fancy facials. Use Ren's glycol mask once or twice a week and you will, likely, feel as if you have brand new skin.   I've offered my own samples to friends. And, each one ends up buying it for themselves.  SO worth the price. You'll feel pampered, for sure. But you'll also feel rejuvenated, with youthful skin. Like a clean canvas for the make-up we all buy.

So many products out there do not deliver and are just a waste of money. Not the case with REN. This product actually does an amazing job perfecting the skin. Works great on my dry, sensitive skin. I love this!

I tried this tonight and my skin looks refreshed and bright. It's an amazing mask and I don't know if I have the guts to leave this on overnight, but I might try leaving it on for an hour next time. Absolutely love it.

I tried this out for the first time last night and I am in awe. Instead of leaving it on for only 10 minutes, I left a thin layer on overnight. When I took it off my skin was smoother then usual. After my regular serum and moisturizer was applied I began my makeup application which is where I saw the biggest difference. Never before has my foundation ever gone on so smoothly and looked so flawless. This mask has literally changed my life overnight. It is amazing at removing any texture without hurting the skin. I have fairly sensitive skin that reddens very easily, and this didn't bother me one bit. This afternoon I purchased the full size bottle as I don't know how I would ever be able to live without this mask again.

I had a really bad rough patch on both sides of my upper nose bridge...everyone at work knows that that is ABSOLUTELY abnormal for me so I asked my SSA (Senior Skincare Advisor) to feel my face and she said i have a lot of texture so she told me to put this mask on there and just...LEAVE IT,...like LEAVE it.I don't have sensitive skin so I was like I'll try it...So i slept in it, now I knew I loved this mask (I have tried it before) but HOLY SPIT I HAD Z E R O texture..it was amazing and I wouldn't have believed it if I had not tried it. Safe to say i LOVE it even more now.

This product is amazing. It really smoothes my skin, I have normal skin so I can use it once or twice a week and it doesn't dry me out or make me break out or anything. I do moisturize after I wash it off. I feel like I'm resetting my skin when I use this.

I don't use exfoliants frequently but did like this.  Skin was very soft and smooth.  Don't know about the pore minimization or fine lines and wrinkles.  It may have helped diminish  hyper pigmentation a little!

reviews.review_title: My go to face skin renewer
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for several years. Try to use it weekly to gently exfoliate and renew my facial skin. Effective without being too harsh. Was recommended by Sephora employee years ago and I continue to purchase this product.

I was really excited to use this product, especially with all the good reviews. But this product breaks me out soooooo bad!!!! Like horrrrible!!!! I've had it for over 6 months and since day 1 every time I put it on soon after I wake up with breakouts everywhere. It's a decent exfoliater, it makes your skin smooth but it doesn't help fade acne scars and just adds more acne and acne marks for me to deal with. It may get rid of the dead skin so it smooths your skin some but it doesn't minimize pores or fade acne scars/marks. It makes more problems then it solves. I've honestly never used a product that broke my skin out so badly. Overall.... It's the worst money I've ever spent on a beauty product. Total waste. Will never use again!!!!
It does exactly what the product description says! And I love it for that, it minimized my huge pores around my nose so well and brightened my skin:)))

I really wanted to love this product - I like ren, I like the way the mask feels when its on, and I am always looking for a brightening mask to have on while I take care of things around the house. Unfortunately, this mask is really disappointing. I've used it on and off for almost a year with the hope that at some point it will live up the hype but it never does. My skin looks the same after the mask as it does before. There are a number of great brightening masks out there, I'd recommend one of those.

I've tried a lot of masks but this one is AMAZING! A little goes a long way and I love the white cloth that also comes along with it to wipe it off with before rinsing. My face looked brighter, clearer and smoother after my first use!

This is the only thing I've ever used that has cleared the stubborn blackheads on my nose! I was suspicious because I didn't feel anything while it was on...no burning of tingling which I usually take to mean it's working. But I noticed improvement as soon as I rinsed it off and my skin looked even better the next morning. And it smells nice. Very happy to have discovered this!

It took a few days for a light peel to appear, but my skin feels great after the mask; I left it on a few minutes extra, no harm done. Overall, one of my favorite weekly treatments. I use RetinA, so this is gentle in comparison to that.

This product definitely lives up to it's claims.   I feel that my skin looks amazing each timeI use this.  I also love how it makes my skin better soak up any other skin care products that I use.  This has become a vital part of my skincare routine.  I can't live without it.

I have never written a review but couldn't help but rave about my love for this product!! I have horrible acne scars. I have tried EVERYTHING short of cosmetic procedures to make them fade. Nothing has worked until now! This mask is AMAZING!! I'm not even through my first bottle and my scars are almost gone. I would never go without makeup before because I was too embarrassed. And while I'll always be a makeup girl, after seeing the results this mask has given me, I won't be ashamed or embarrassed to be fresher faced around people. I leave it on a little longer than directed, around 30-45 min and wash it off with a warm cloth. My skin has never looked better! I will forever use this mask. Forever! I just bought the wake wonderful night-time facial to use in conjunction with the mask. Ren is the best. Seriously. The best. This product is worth the price. Trust!

I was very pleased with the results of this mask. My skin was smooth, and not irritated at all, which was just what I was looking for. Apply with caution, the pump delivers generous portions. This was my first purchase from the Ren brand, and it definitely met my expectations.
This is an amazing mask that leaves your skin beautiful and glowing, with no redness afterward.
A little goes a long way. You will definitely see results and enjoy soft smooth skin afterwards.

reviews.review_title: It is a great product but a little pricey.
reviews.review_text: First of all, I am a huge fan of Ren. I idolize every product I bought, since they are amazing. This one is amazing too, because you can clearly see a difference on your skin instantly. However, the price could be a little lower. By the way, the smell is really kinda like sweet tangerine candy...

I bought this mask on a friend's recommendation, and while it definitely does make my skin feel smoother, it's also stronger than I expected. Per the instructions, I left a thin coat on for ten minutes after a shower. It tingled a bit (which the packaging says is normal...), and when I took it off most of my face looked great -- but one area on my cheek was red and irritated. I tried to salvage things with a calming mask, but two days later the area is starting to peel/flake...   I do want to keep using this mask because it definitely does work, but am going to be careful to leave it on for less than 10 minutes in the future!
La texture du produit est trop fluide ce qui fait qu'il ne reste pas en place pour la duru00e9e de pose. Autrement, le ru00e9sultat sur la peau est satisfaisant.
nice for sensitive skin non irratating

Pros: -Made my skin feel/look super clean after rinsing off -Smells nice -Small amount of product but it lasts a long time -Great exfoliater  Cons: -Burned a lot during the first two weeks of use - eventually dulled to a slightly uncomfortable, itchy feeling -Didn't do anything to lighten acne scars/hyperpigmentation   I do really like this mask and think it's one of the most effective masks I've used. I saw results but not enough to keep spending $55 on less than 2oz of product. The main reason I bought this was to see if it could lighten some pesky  hyperpigmentation on my chin. Sadly, it didn't.   I may repurchase down the road but this isn't an immediate repurchase for me.

I feel like this would be the perfect mask for someone with very sensitive skin; however, for my skin, it feels like it does nothing. It's super thick in consistency (a little thicker than honey). It doesn't tingle, doesn't give a cooling or warming sensation. It just sits. I've used it 1-2 times a week for about 5 weeks now and haven't noticed a difference in any of the acne scarring I have on my jaw. As far as the exfoliating factor goes, the cloth that it comes with is really what's working for taking off any dead skin. I feel like I could easily get the same exfoliating effect with a gentle exfoliating cleanser. Overall, I'll probably finish the bottle (it's not horrible so I won't return it), but I won't repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Best product in the REN line
reviews.review_text: I have REN moisturizers, serums, oils, etc. This mask is a luscious treat.  I leave on for 15 minutes and have never experienced adverse effects. My skin is sensitive to masks and exfoliants with grit or texture so this product is perfect for me. I can hardly wait for Sunday nights when I use all of my special face treatments.

I am 59 and after neglecting my skin for a couple years it had started looking quite bad. I had used this product a few years ago with very good results, so bought again a couple months ago. I started a new regime of using this twice a week, using a vitamin C morning moisturizer, and a retinol product at night. Wow, after two months my skin has improved so much. It does not have as much discoloration and my pores have decreased. I will definitely keep up this routine!
Gentle and easy to use. The scent is less than delightful though.

I have been struggling with adult acne breakouts for the last few months.... I can finally say that my skin is clear and glowing thanks to this mask... It has even completely eliminated and signs of hyper pigmentation and acne scars left behind from the sudden breakouts. I am honestly shocked with the results... My skin has never looked better! This product really worked for me! Not letting this mask out of my sight any time soon!!!

Received this as a sample and used it last night for the first time. Woke up this morning like my face looks awesome! My pores were definitely smaller and my skin appeared brighter and smoother. I had to ask my coworker if she noticed a difference to make sure I wasn't making it up in my head. Definitely will buy the full product. Seems like a keeper!!!
Every time I use it, people tell me my skin looks great or that I'm glowing---randomly!

Got this as a sample and liked it so ordered full size. It really does brighten my dull aging skin, making it look and feel softer and smoother. Been using it a month and can see big difference in how my makeup looks better. Twice a week, 10 minutes, it works!!

I use this product twice a week and you notice a difference right after your first use. I use this after my Kate Somerville Exfolikate. This power duo combined results in a more youthful, plump and fresh looking skin.

I use this once a week as well as their flash rinse facial. My skin has not glowed this much in years. My acne has cleared a lot, and it has helped with a lot of my faces redness and with my hyper pigmentation and scarring. I am grateful to this line. I will say stay out of the sun when using these products, or use SPF everyday.

This did nothing to even my skintone or reduce my hyperpigmentation. Ive used it regularly for weeks until I ran out of my sample. There was no improvement to my skin. Also, it stung a little a little bit

this mask is effective at evening out my skin tone and it's a good product to use when you get blemishes popping up (even those under the skin pimples with no head). my skin feels smoother afterwards and reduces acne scars but you have to use it regularly to see a big difference. It doesn't irritate my sensitive skin which I was worried it would. It doesn't help with my blackheads though, they're too stubborn.

I used to love this, but I tried this again recently and my skin is far too sensitive for it now. If you have sensitive skin I would not recommend, but if your skin can take it it is absolutely beautiful to use! My skin would feel so smooth and soft after just one use, and my texture issues would diminish a lot after consistent use. This is popular, for good reason. Please, though, do a test in a sensitive area to ensure you don't get a reaction.

I originally got this mask as a sample. I used it twice and was pleased with the way my skin looked so I bought the full size. I've used this product a total of 4 times and I am in shock. It has almost cleared my poc marked acne scars completely up. And they were old and very deep scars from cystic acne. I mean it is unbelievable. People have actually came up to me grabbed my face and turned my head back and forth and asked what type of scar removal have I been undergoing. I never thought I'd ever in 10 million years see my skin look almost scar free. I'm so happy I could cry. Thank you Ren and Sephora for making a miracle happen.

I am very happy with this mask. I havenu2019t noticed great changes to my skin, but I have noticed, with 2 uses once a week, my skin is a little more plump and awake, some very fine lines have diminished. And I know is this mask because it is the only new element in my routine, so I believe it will become part of my weekly skincare routine. I will say that on the 8th minute I did start feeling a tingling/stinging sensation on my face, that when I took the mask off, my face felt firmer, but I havenu2019t noticed no big changes, but then again it isnu2019t one of my skin problems.

reviews.review_title: Go-To fav for all skin issues
reviews.review_text: This mask is my absolute favorite and its hard to explain why. It's not an instant miracle worker but whenever my skin is misbehaving I first grab this mask, usually use at night, and I wake up to feel like my skin is near recovery. I do a weekly/bi-weekly mask and alternate ren with glam glow or a more drying charcoal mask. Loooooove and this will stay in my cupboard. I will never let you go my sweet
Best mask. I have tried every mask to get rid of my renton a uglies and this one is the best hands known. Removes all flakes.

I got a sample of this about a year back and used it, not thinking much of it. At the time my skin was pretty great, blemish free, few fine lines, etc. About a month ago, I got a sever breakout across my chin and cheeks. The acne had subsided, but I had lots of small red spots where the acne had create scaring. I tried this mask again (this time borrowing from my sister) and noticed a significant reduction in the redness. I bought it about a week later, and I cannot rave about its effects enough. It did wonders for my hyperpigmentation and for fine lines. I would definitely recommend to people looking to reduce scaring and uneven skintone.

Once upon a time, Philosophy made a peel using papaya, pineapple, and other fruit extracts and called it an enzyme peel. It was about $20. I had used the entire bottle, and never really saw a difference.  Flash forward to this product by REN. It smells, looks, and feels EXACTLY the same as the old Philosophy peel. For $35 more and with all the rave reviews, I though well maybe I'll see a difference with this one instead. Nope. No change whatsoever. I have dry, flaky, acne-prone skin with a few tiny wrinkles starting to creep in. I at least expected this to remove the flaking skin.  If the Philosophy enzyme peel worked for you, give this a shot. If not, save your money.

Was given a sample of this product a few years ago and have been using it ever since. It is a gel and goes on easily. I wipe off after 10 minutes, tone and moisturize. It really leaves my skin soft and I feel that my moisturizer penetrates the skin. I have notices a correction to fine lines due to dryness.

I got this as a sample and have used it once. So far, so good. I have dry, sensitive skin and no breakouts or burning. I noticed an instant tightness of my pores and was happy with the clarity of my complexion. I'll be buying the full bottle.
got this as a sample,third day using it. i have noticed a radiant glow! about to order the regular size tub

reviews.review_title: Great ani-acne mask for sensitive skin!
reviews.review_text: I have pretty sensitive skin and am prone to eczema, but this is a great mask to use when I am breaking out. I tend to use in waves (ie a couple times a week if I have a breakout) and it does a great job of minimizing the damage from acne. Also brightens my complexion for the next day which is great!

I had a foil sample of this. I didn't mind it when it was on my skin, smelt a little weird but given the type of mask it is that didn't surprise me or bother me. I didn't notice any difference in my skin after taking it off but the next morning I woe up with massive break outs all over my face. Large groups of deep bumps. I know it was the mask because I didnt change anything else in my skincare routine. Over a week later my skin is still trying to recover from this mask and I haven't been able to wear makeup because of how bad it is.

I was excited to try this mask specially after reading all the great reviews. However, I have not seen a single difference on my skin. nothing. Im sad that it didn't work out for me and disappointed that i bought it before getting a sample
I loved it 2 years ago and stopped using it. After buying it again decently I don't understand why I stopped! Love this!

I had two sample bottles of this mask and decides to finally give it a try. The smell was so horrendous that I thought the product had gone bad. First, liquid ran out of the bottle then what appeared to be exfoliant. I opened the second bottle to check its aroma and it was just as bad. I put the product on my face to give it a try still and the smell was so nauseating that I had to wash it off. I put on my delicious-smelling hydrating Glam Glow mask instead.

I am so in love with this product. I have recruited countless people into trying it after I've explained how much I adore it. They all seem to really enjoy it as well! My skin is sensitive and I have no problems with this. It makes my sun damaged, dry & dull skin actually look beautiful. No word of a lie, people always compliment my complexion the day after I use this mask. Thanks REN <3

reviews.review_title: Worth every penny and then some!
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite mask and only one I've tried that actually does what it says immediately. Results are brighter and glowing skin. It doesnt irritate my skin or dry it out like glam glow. You need this in your life so what are you waiting for??

Got this as a sample with my online order and it it actually amazing! Makes my skin glow and makeup goes on so smooth after using it, didnt even need a primer. Will definitely be purchasing full size, just wish it wasnt so pricey.

Every time I use this, my skin glows. I absolutely love it. The bottle lasts for quite some time. I prefer this product to the professional peels I've gotten in the past.  After using, I put a layer of the Ciinique Moisture Surge Gel Creme on. I wake up with that dewy soft skin look.  (I have pretty sensitive skin that is easily irritated, but haven't had an issue with this product. I grabbed a sample in store to test it out before purchasing)

I have been using this product at least once a week for a few months now. My face feels smoother and more radiant when using it twice a week. Helps reduce appearance of acne scars, but not pigmentation. Strong citrus scent.

I am IN LOVE with this mask. Even after the first use, i knew this would be a game changer. My skin has never felt so smooth, and looked so radiant. I am in LOVE. I have fairly sensitive skin, which is usually dry and dull, but right now it feels and looks amazing thanks to this!!!!
Tried first time based to my friend recommendation. I was impressed how smooth and bright my skin even just first use, I leave it for 20minutes. My skin feels good and make up looks flawless

I received a sample of this in a beauty box and have used it 3 times. I have very sensitive skin so most products I cannot use. It reminds me of a pumpkin mask I used years ago. I left it on longer than it tells you on the packaging. when I took it off I rubbed it into my face rinsed off with a clean wash cloth after that I put on Glytone Antioxidant anti-Aging night cream, also go that in a beauty box. The next day I was amazed how my skin was glowing, I have just turned 50 don't look like it and would like it to stay that way. So I am glad that I have found a product that I can use and have no problems I would recommend this product to anyone that has sensitive skin
Love love love this product. Works best when you exfoliates before use. Gave away my murad c peel once I found this.
Wow - in 2 uses I am seeing & feeling the results! Smells great too & result driven quickly !!! Love this mask!!!!

My skin is so soft and shiny it feels so surreal. Love how my makeup looks smooth and flawless. I have very dry skin and I love how this makes my face feel so soft. I am on my third bottle and will purchase more.

I received a sample of this in a beauty box and used it last night. This am I looked like I have no pores. This combo of Lactic and glycolic is like magic. I use glycolic peels that don't clean out the pores as well as this did. I left it on for 20 minutes instead of 10, rinsed off with a clean wash cloth and then just splashed water on my face and I was amazed. This to me beats KS exfolikate. My skin was not irritated or red after. Put some Nude repair oil and a moisturizer. I just purchased the full sized one today.

This is a good mask to use weekly or bi-weekly to exfoliate your skin. A lot of products irritate my skin and this does sting a little, which is why I only gave it 4 stars. Once I take it off my skin is glowing and doesn't look irritated. I also just love the REN line and think they make high quality, pretty affordable stuff.
Works great. I use it weekly.

I have very dry/sensitive skin and this product works wonders! It helps remove flakes and impurities and leaves my skin feeling soft and not too dried out. I use it once a week, sometimes twice during the winter months to help eliminate dry patches. I always use a moisturizer after this mask to make sure I don't let my skin get too dry. I've been using this for 2+ years, I absolutely love this product!
This is my new go to for a quick skin rescue. It exfoliates and brightens my super sensitive skin in minutes, and doesn't flare my excema or cause breakouts. Love it!

reviews.review_title: Slowly but surely, it really works.
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this product. I have combination skin, that is sensitive and it also loves to break out. Finding products has been really hard for me, until someone at sephora recommended this. I use it once a week, and I cannot wait until the day comes when I get to use it. I use it at night and my skin always looks better and more clear by morning. It's slowly been helping with the redness that comes from very mild rosacea, it tames break outs and my pores are hardly noticeable now and have noticeably shrunk. It's not a miracle product and you need to be patient to see long term results, but if you have sensitive skin, it's what you need and it's totally worth it. I gave it a 4 because it's my first exfoliating mask that I use once a week, so I don't feel experienced enough to say it's the best of the best. BUT, if you give it time, it works.

I have very problematic skin- flaky dryness all over, adult acne in my t-zone, oily chin, etc. The girl at Sephora asked me what I was using as an exfoliant and I told her the Origins Modern Friction (which I thought was probably my best bet for taking care of flakiness without causing a breakout) and she told me to try this Ren Renewal mask instead. She told me that the difference between the two products is that the Origins dermabrasion product will actually irritate and spread bacteria around more, possibly causing more breakouts whereas this one has fruit acids that will eat up the dry skin. I bought it and went home and tried it and in one try all the flakiness on my forehead and around my nose was gone. I can't wait to keep using this product to see what it does for my skin long term, because I'm already impressed. Also- it smells amazing.

I purchased this product about a year ago and tend to use it when I feel like my skin is looking dull and needs a 'pick me up'. The texture is like honey; very thick and sticky. The smell is a mix between citrus orange and chemically-herbs. I leave this mask on for 15 minutes and rinse with warm water and a washcloth. I don't find that this product leaves any residue on my face, but it is left feeling clean. One thing I did notice, is that when I leave this product on longer than 15 minutes, it tends to leave my face slightly orange after rinsing. This product is meant to brighten and add radiance, but that is one thing that I have not found this product to give me. Unfortunately, I will not be repurchasing this product.
Just makes my skin smooth and clear. The citrus smell is very pleasant. This is easy to use and gives long lasting results. This is my new favorite skin mask.

I received the REN glycolic mask as a sample, I can tell an immediate difference in my skin as soon as I take it off and noticeable improvements for the next few days. Going to buy a full size this week and plan to use it twice a week.

I definitely was not a fan of this product. The smell and color remind me of a weird tamarind. The mask felt great while it was on-- hydrating. The following day I broke out terribly. The directions mention wiping off the mask with a damp cloth then rinsing with warm water. It's possible I didn't rinse well enough because my breakouts were all around the edge of my face but even then, I didn't expect a product to break me out so bad. The pimples aren't the normal kind either, they are so huge and so deep! Nodular acne. I'm so sad because with this type of acne, it could last weeks before the bumps subside. If you have slightly oily, acne prone skin tread carefully with this one.

It does seem to help with smoothing out my skin but it's very heavy and greasy. Even when you take it off, it feels like there's a film left behind on your skin and I tend to breakout a day or two after using it. Also not a fan of all of the irritating and photosensitizing citrus oils used.
